author: Mike Stobbe
title: Some doctors moving away from ventilators for virus patients
description: NEW YORK (AP) — As health officials around the world push to get more ventilators to treat coronavirus patients, some doctors are moving away from using the breathing machines when they...
content:
NEW YORK (AP) As health officials around the world push to get more ventilators to treat coronavirus patients, some doctors are moving away from using the breathing machines when they can.
The reason: Some hospitals have reported unusually high death rates f… [+6207 chars]
